pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"在 rosdep 使用流程中，我们会有如下两个步骤"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}rosdep init
rosdep update","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"我们替换为以下步骤"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["首先手动模拟 rosdep init，这可以参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/github-raw/","children":"GitHub RAW 镜像"}]," 中 rosdep init 一节。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"之后执行以下指令。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# 为 rosdep update 换源
export ROSDISTRO_INDEX_URL={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/index-v4.yaml
rosdep update

# 每次 rosdep update 之前，均需要增加该环境变量
# 为了持久化该设定，可以将其写入 .bashrc 中，例如
echo 'export ROSDISTRO_INDEX_URL={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/index-v4.yaml' >> ~/.bashrc","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: ROS Distro 镜像使用帮助
